106.heading: 2002 A.D.
106.title: "New York City 2002"
106.author: by Rob Hingley, Kenny Sylvester, Pete Ciccone, and Pepe Moreno ; illustrated by Pepe Moreno
106.appears_in: p. 58-65 in Heavy Metal, v. 9, no. 13 (i.e., v. 9, no. 1) (Apr. 1985).
notes: Begins: "Welcome to Brooklyn, garden spot of New York, or what used to be New York. It's a mess. Nobody lives here now, at least nobody you'd want to meet. Outcasts and misfits...Rebels. The streets are a battleground. Take a step off your own turf, and you're in big trouble. And then, there's the Sanitation Police."

notes: SUMMARY: Appearances of mention of authors Poe, Bierce, Dickens, Shakespeare, De La Mare, Wakefield, Tolkien, Lovecraft, Wells, Huxley, Blackwood, Machen, Coppard, all of whose books were outlawed and burned in 2020 A.D. 1.
